cleaned_text: Enchanting, soothing aromas that align with your daily purpose. Set your intention and spritz - it's just that easy! 100% pure essential oils + zero toxic ingredients. No alcohol, synthetic fragrances or perfumes. Made for your skin, clothes, office, upholstery, vehicle & anywhere else higher vibes are calling. Safe around pets - just don't spray them! Made with full moon water, clear quartz crystals and intentionally positive energy for an uplifting experience like no other! With over a quarter ounce of pure, organic essential oils in every bottle, this isn't your average lightly-scented, 'did they even put any oils in here', kind of spray. More like...'dang what are you wearing that smells so good'... 4 hours later, kind of spray. Intentionally bathing can help us tap into the power of the present, enhancing our mental, physical, and spiritual health. More than just a hygiene routine, it offers a chance to de-stress, reset, and rejuvenate ourselves.
